title: gAna rasamuDan
sahitya:
gAna rasamuDan nin tiruppugazh tanaiyE paDittiDak-
karuNai puri murugaiyanE manNam kuLira madhuramozhugu


anupallavi

  dInNa parAdhIna sujana dainya haraNa nipuNa suguNa
dAnava samhAra vElanE skandanE mukundan marumaganE


caraNam    aDiyiNai tanil iDaiyarAda anbenum naru maNam vIshum
taDaiyara enrum vADAda muttamizh malar eDuttu
toDarezu vagai svaram enum mrduvAna nAril toDuttu nidamum
paDi pugazh pazhani mudaliya nin padigaL tOrum paravip-paNindu
